name: The Tales of Bingwood: Chapter 1 - To Save a Princess
name_original: The Tales of Bingwood: Chapter 1 - To Save a Princess
description:
The Tales of Bingwood: Chapter 1 - To Save a Princess is an adventure game developed by BugFactory Games. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by BugFactory Games.
You can play The Tales of Bingwood: Chapter 1 - To Save a Princess on PC.
